title: Happy Basset - Rare Breed Wheat
post_text: This wheat beer from Happy Basset is a rare delight. Its smooth texture and refreshing flavors make it a must-try for wheat beer enthusiasts.

title: Alma Mader - Between Coasts IPA
post_text: Between Coasts IPA by Alma Mader is a hop lover's dream. Bursting with bold flavors and a balanced bitterness, this IPA is a true delight for any beer connoisseur.

title: Servaes Brewing - Rosemary Raspberry Sour
post_text: Servaes Brewing's Rosemary Raspberry Sour is a unique and flavorful concoction. The tangy raspberries blend perfectly with the aromatic rosemary, creating a delightful sour beer experience.

title: Social Project - Learn To Fly Sour
post_text: Learn To Fly Sour by Social Project is a tangy and refreshing delight. Its lively sourness is complemented by subtle fruity notes, making it a perfect choice for sour beer aficionados.

title: WeldWorks - Blueberry Cobbler Sour
post_text: WeldWerks' Blueberry Cobbler Sour is a delectable treat. Bursting with juicy blueberries and a hint of cinnamon, this sour beer captures the essence of a delicious homemade cobbler.

title: Narrow Gauge - Up Down Left Right IPA
post_text: Up Down Left Right IPA by Narrow Gauge is a hop-forward delight. With a balanced blend of citrusy and piney flavors, this IPA takes your taste buds on a flavorful journey in every sip.

title: Social Project - Western Sun IPA
post_text: Western Sun IPA from Social Project is a hop lover's paradise. With its robust blend of citrusy and resinous flavors, this IPA shines brightly, leaving a lingering satisfaction on the palate.

title: Lua Brewing - Time Stops IPA
post_text: Time Stops IPA by Lua Brewing is a captivating brew. Its well-balanced hop profile combines citrusy and floral notes, resulting in a refreshing and memorable IPA that makes time stand still.

title: Surly Brewing - In The Fade IPA
post_text: In The Fade IPA by Surly Brewing is an exceptional brew. With its bold hop character, featuring piney and tropical flavors, this IPA delivers a smooth and satisfying experience from start to finish.

title: Toppling Goliath - Radiant Haze IPA
post_text: Radiant Haze IPA from Toppling Goliath is a true gem. Bursting with juicy tropical flavors and a silky smooth mouthfeel, this IPA brings a radiant and refreshing experience with every sip.

title: Roughtail Brewing - Daylight DIPA
post_text: Daylight DIPA by Roughtail Brewing is a hop lover's dream. With its robust hop profile and balanced malt backbone, this Double IPA shines with citrus, pine, and tropical flavors, creating a bold and satisfying drinking experience.

title: Narrow Gauge - J.U.I.C.E. IPA
post_text: J.U.I.C.E. IPA from Narrow Gauge is a hop bomb of juicy goodness. Bursting with tropical fruit flavors and a smooth, hazy body, this IPA delivers a refreshing and vibrant taste that keeps you coming back for more.
